text: Yappity-yap~  It's Francis!
In Japan, there's a fabulous menu in which you can eat popular regular Western dishes all at once.
It's called Kid's Lunch!  Do you know about it, everyone?
I am already on my way so I can introduce delicious Kid's Lunch to you!
There are so many yummy-looking foods...
There you go!  I found Kid's Lunch!
Grown-ups don't get to eat Kid's Lunch!
Why?  Why am I not allowed to eat it?
Wait!  This place must be...?
[sniff sniff] I smell some food...
The name rings a bell...
This must be the place my foodie friend was talking about!
I ordered Kid's Lunch!  Oh, I'm excited...
This is, without a doubt, Kid's Lunch!
This is a cafe called Baby King Kitchen, where both grown-ups and kids can enjoy Kid's Lunch.
I am going to introduce this lovely place to everyone!
So, please tell us what led you to opening this restaurant.
Serving delicious foods in small portions...Isn't that a lot of work?
I see~ That's some ingenuity there!
It's important not to cut back on all these efforts!
Thanks to the love of those who work at this restaurant, even grown-ups get to eat Kid's Lunch.
As I expected, Kid's Lunch is attractive!
Can I go for a second helping?
